title: Who can use Google Classroom? - Quora

response.answer_text: Google classroom is not restricted to anyone. Being a teacher, student, school or any other institution can use the google classroom. It’s very useful and effective tool to do online quizzes/test, assignments. During the COVID-19 pandemic most of institutions are using the google classroom as an alternative of education delivery.
Anyone! You need Google account and students with (Google account) then you are good to go! You can make a class and invite your students using email id or they can join you using class code.
